metadata.dc:author: Gómez, M J
Dorronsoro, I
Díaz, R
metadata.dc:description: C. fetus ss jejuni was demonstrated in stool samples from 17 patients, among 605 studied, using the selective media of Skirrow. 13 of them were children, 11 two years' old or younger, and 4 were adult patients. The frequency of isolation of C. fetus ss jejuni in stool cultures has been greater than the isolation of Y. enterocolitica serotype 3, S. sonnei and E. coli, and has been only superated by the isolation of microorganisms belonging to the generus Salmonella.
metadata.dc:title: Enteritis por Campylobacter fetus en Navarra.
[Enteritis caused by Campylobacter fetus in Navarre].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de medicina de la Universidad de Navarra
